[[inst_ssrswap]]
==== SSRSWAP

*Syntax:* ssrswap SrcL, SSR_ID, ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Swap System Status Register value.

image::../generated/encodings/enc_ssrswap.svg[SSRSWAP encoding,width=800]

*Group:* SYS/SSR
